column4: just installed 9.10 on my laptop, now my ethernet/wireless (BCM5784M / AR928X) don't work.  lshw -C network says both are unclaimed.  anyone got any suggestions?
there appears to be an atheros driver, ath9k, and i've modprobe'd that, but still nothing shows up in my network.  attempting "sudo service networking start" just spits out "networking stop/waiting"
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
